summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4763 for the improvement of 16th Avenue Northwest, from West 75th Street to West 85th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 55108, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
